title.rendered: Rally Industrial Bar Stool – various heights available

content.rendered:
The Rally Bar Stool is fresh, luxurious and timeless. Upholstered in a genuine leather with a black frame for a distinctive style.

Held in stock for delivery in 2-3 working days. Suitable for commercial use, perfect for bars, clubs and hotels.

This chair pairs well with our industrial tables and we also offer the Rally in a side chair. The maximum tested weight is 200kg on this item.
